DOC.brief_summary: Healthy physical activity decrease blood pressure young female school child . It also effect BMI math score .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Intervention Female School Children : Effect Blood Pressure , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) , Maths Scores
DOC.detailed_description: - Primary Objective : To compare effect 6 month healthy physical activity blood pressure female school child ( 9-13 yr ) routine physical activity - Secondary objective : To compare effect 6 month healthy physical activity body mass index math score routine physical activity - Study Design : It would non-randomized experimental study ( community intervention trial ) . It design test effectiveness exercise reduce blood pressure effect BMI math score - Setting : The study would conduct 4 public sector school Karachi . - Study Population : The study population would select 4 local public sector school near hospital , The Aga Khan University Hospital . Two school would intervention 2 school would serve control . Both group would base line screen outcome variable 6 month - Intervention : The intervention 30 minute healthy physical activity ; 4-times/week would carry period 6 month . This would carry certified physical trainer expert train child aerobic exercise . Intervention group half hour session exercise motivation benefit . The routine activity group similar session baseline . - Sampling technique : convenience sample - Sample Size : A sample size 126 ( 63 arm ) achieve 80 % power detect difference 4.3 mm systolic blood pressure null hypothesis mean 110.3 alternative hypothesis mean 105.7 estimate standard deviation 9.7 significance level ( alpha ) 0.05 use one side one sample test . Assuming could 10 % dropout rate plan take total sample size 140 student . We multiply total sample size 2 account design effect cluster ( school ) achieve total sample size 280 140 arm . - Dependent variable outcome variable : Primary outcome measure would blood pressure . Secondary outcome measure would body composition include weight , BMI , central obesity , math score . Independent variable would demographic ( age , school class ) intervention healthy physical activity measurement food intake frequency
DOC.criteria: Female child age 911 yr enrol public sector school compound facility would include study . Intervention would offer normal age specific weight percentile . Those suffer chronic illness due participate mentally physically disable exclude study .
